to_address: "Speakup is a screen review system for Linux." <speakup@braille.uwo.ca>
subject: Re: DecTalk PC Reading Program
body:
A very nice parapilegic man paid me to scan in several
startrek novels for him... tbus I inherited them...

I wouldn't be surprised if they weren't available as
audio books or other format by now through Paramount.



--- Spie Smith  wrote:

> Where did you get those Star Trek novels?  I wish I
> had a whole set of
> all of them for all the shows.  
> 
> f you can give me a URL to all those novels, I would
> be glad.  
>
